descriptionHtml:
[color=green]
READ!!! Check all the pictures and see if you want to download this player home =D

I decided to do drastic changes and reupload.

Anyway, hope you enjoy this player  home.

Facts about Throne of Gold:

Includes 6 married women to you in one section of the house.
Includes 6 males in the other section of the house, featuring: Max Pain, Wei Shen, Ichigo Hollowsaki, etc.
Includes 10,000 gold coins waiting for you in a chest.
The 12 people in the house make your house feel more alive and have ai packages to get them to go around and do things.
Only several of the 12 will not follow, the rest will follow you anywhere.
The entrances can be found at Breezehome in Whiterun at the campfire where there will now be a trapdoor. Secondly, a trapdoor in the waterpool near Dragonsreach.
The player home has a throne.
The player home has gold coins and sacks all over it.
The 6 females are always showering or sleeping.
The water area is pretty sweet.
There are working display cases.

Bugs:

None at the moment, I spent a whole hour fixing the old one and made sure everything functions correctly.

[/color]
author: DinoCarbon
